column2:
# please someone make this in one pipeline
freq_split <- lang_summary_all %>% 
  group_by(year_split) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(frequency_split = sum(frequency), .groups = "keep") %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  full_join(lang_summary_all) %>% 
  mutate(prop = round(frequency / frequency_split, 3) * 100) %>% 
  group_by(year_split) %>% 
  arrange(desc(prop)) %>%
  ungroup()
